html:
By Craig BlairMarch 25, 2025No Comments1 Min Read

Canon USA has put some big discounts on various refurbished cameras and lenses. These prices are great and inventory probably won’t last long

Canon EOS Cameras

  • Canon EOS R5 Mark II Body $3599
  • Canon EOS R6 Mark II $1599
  • Canon EOS R8 $999
  • Canon EOS RP Body $499
  • Canon EOS-1D X Mark III $2699

Canon RF Lenses

  • Canon RF 35mm f/1.4L VCM $1199
  • Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM $1499
  • Canon RF 85mm f/1.2L USM DS $1999

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.

    Craig is the founder and editorial director for Canon Rumors. He has been writing about all things Canon for more than 17 years. When he's not writing, you can find him shooting professional basketball and travelling the world looking for the next wildlife adventure. The Canon EOS R1 is his camera of choice.
